top.title: Russia yet to receive anything official from US on Ukraine peace plan, Kremlin says
top.summary: The draft provisions come across as heavily slanted towards Moscow, but Volodymyr Zelensky says he is ready to work with the US.

top.title: Trump's growing impatience to end Ukraine war is a concern for Kyiv
top.summary: The US is working to a quick timetable to push through the deal, which appears to heavily reflect many of Moscow's demands.

top.title: Anti-Hamas armed groups seek future role under Gaza peace plan
top.summary: Several groups - some of them backed by Israel - are ranged against Hamas in Gaza, with complex and overlapping ties.

top.title: Vinted blocks 'sickening' sexually explicit ads
top.summary: The online marketplace removed adverts which included a video a user said depicted a pornographic scene.

top.title: Graduate jobs under threat from AI, PwC boss says
top.summary: The accountancy giant says artificial intelligence will eventually lead to fewer entry-level positions at the firm.

top.title: Streaming platform Twitch added to Australia's teen social media ban
top.summary: It joins other platforms including Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and Snapchat in the ban that starts next month.

title.#text: AirDropping stuff from a Pixel phone rules so much
Apple’s new limited edition iPhone grip is all about accessibility
